name: Lights Out (itch) (Zakroutil)
description:
FLASHING IMAGES WARNING!

You are being hunted in a maze-like map by a monster that changes location every 10 seconds.

You have been blessed with celestial light, but this light shines only when you stand still.

Navigate the darkness without getting caught and enter the holy light.

Playing with headphones is recommended.

Lights Out was created in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

Movement: W, S, A, D

Sprint: Left Shift
